# Public Assets Directory

This directory contains static assets served by Cloudflare Pages.

## Generated Files

- `index.html` - This file is **generated** from the template in `src/index.js` by running `npm run build`
  - If you modify `src/index.js`, remember to run `npm run build` to regenerate this file
  - The file is committed to the repository for Cloudflare Pages automatic deployments

## Static Assets

- `css/` - Stylesheets
- `js/` - JavaScript files

All files in this directory are served directly by Cloudflare Pages.
